Afterwards, I will pour out my spirit on everyone. Your sons and your daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams. Your young men will see visions,
and even on your male and female slaves in those days, I will pour out my spirit.
And I will show signs in the sky and on earth: Blood and fire and pillars of smoke.
The sun will be turned into darkness, and the moon into blood before the coming of the great and terrible day of the \nd Lord\nd*.

But whoever will call upon the name of the 
d Lord
d* will be saved. For in Mount Zion and in Jerusalem there will be those who escape, even as the 
d Lord
d* has said, and among the fugitives those whom the 
d Lord
d* calls.
